# uniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for the characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniqueIdentifier: UUID { get }
```

## Identifying a characteristic

- **localizedDescription**: The localized description of the characteristic.

items.description: The localized description of the characteristic.
